website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses others in its class when it comes to looks, functionality, and craftsmanship. The one to pick if you want a great-looking watch that's suitable for work and play.
pros: Earns praise for its impressive looks thanks to the 18k gold ion-plated stainless steel that resists fading
Chronograph trio of subdials add to its handsome looks
cons: Feels somewhat heavy on the wrist
The band is long, likely requiring removal of some links to get a precise fit for most men
A few reports of quality control issues

customer_reviews.title: I really love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I really love this watch. it's shiny and durable. I have huge wrists and this is a men's watch but it's perfect for me. Invicta makes the best watches ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the clock brings the bottom button out of its ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the clock brings the bottom button out of its position. It came sealed, I guess manufacturing failure. Unfortunately I live outside of the USA and the return cost is too high to request reimbursement.
customer_reviews.author: Patricio Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch, although I wasn't a fan of the gold band so I swapped in a leather nato strap, which was done using a watch tool and took maybe 2 minutes. I have 8 inch wrists, and when it was delivered was way to big to fit me even, so you will have to remove some links to make it fit if you don't swap out the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always with Invicta Watch. it
customer_reviews.text: A masterpiece watch.I love everything about the watch. I will recommend it to all my friends.Thanks!!!!!.It's a FIVE Star Watch.
customer_reviews.author: DOMINIC G.

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot, definitely worth the money, took it to a jewler to get sized, they said the gold plating was real. Looks great, feels heavy, nice face, fully functional, and looks sexy! Definitely an eye catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob west

customer_reviews.title: This watch is the TRUTH order now
customer_reviews.text: Best watch ever Great quality very official I can tell it will last for awhile Very classy for any occasion My husband was so thrilled (Father’s Day gift) He couldn’t stop smiling
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Pretty

customer_reviews.title: Do not use a punch to remove links from band
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch for money. Screw down crown. I was an avid scuba diver for years. This watch is nice, however not for diving. Hands and face would be hard to see at depth due to lack of contrast. Spent 20$ to have band length reduced as for the screw in pins. One caution save the extra links and pins. They are expensive to replace. They actually have threads on them do not hammer them with a punch. Enjoy the watch
customer_reviews.author: margaret W.

customer_reviews.title: PHENOMENAL INVICTA WATCH!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! That pretty much sums up this watch. It's incredible for the price. Very solid and well made. The overall weight is on the heavy side which I like; nothing flimsy, light or cheap about this watch. The gold color is a true gold; it doesn't look like brass. It's a keeper for sure. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: T. F. WhiteTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Warrenty card not stamped! If you need warrenty work, you are screwed.
customer_reviews.text: Received the watch and loved it until I looked at the warranty. The card that came with the watch has a blank card and that's just wrong. If you want this watch, buy it from a reputable dealer. Also, the hands are hard to see. Update, After talking with Amazon, they said for me to fill the card out? I will give it a go, but if you look at the card, I don't feel good about this. Also I see a lot of people complaining about the band size. I took mine to my jeweler, and 3.00 later had a perfect fitting watch.
customer_reviews.author: RWJ

customer_reviews.title: great watch!!! will recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. , once I got It, I went to a jewelry store to get links taken out which I always have to do that because I have small wrists .. this is my favorite watch by far... my confidence rises when I wear this watch... I don't wear it for everyday use because I just don't want to and not because you cant . I only wear it on dates, to church or to go out things like that. always get compliments about the watch . it looks just like the picture .. if u need a good affordable gold watch this item is for you!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch. Take it to a jeweler to shorten band.
customer_reviews.text: Watch arrives in a classy yellow invicta case/box, and is packaged and sealed in plastic wrap. Watch truly resembles the selling image. If you plan on shortening the wrist band I would suggest taking it to a jeweler. The pins that hold the watch band together aren't the easiest to remove. I have taken links out of many watches, but the cotter pin style system this watch has wasn't the easiest to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Possibly Too Early?
customer_reviews.text: It is actually too soon after receiving the watch to review it. I gave it 5 stars because it fits in with my collection of Invicta watches and I do not anticipate any problems when I get to wear it for awhile. The bezel works perfectly and the jewelry aspects are perfect. It's only the movement that it's too early to comment on.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gache

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a $500 watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I bought it as a gift for my nephew. It’s very modern and expensive looking. Great quality for the price I paid. I took it to a jeweler to get it engraved, and they commented on how beautiful it was. They thought I spent a fortune on it, and I didn’t tell them any different. I can’t wait to give it to my nephew, I know he’ll love it.
customer_reviews.author: T. McLean

customer_reviews.title: Good quality watch.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very lovely timepiece, head turner for sure, get allot of compliments on it. Specially with the lady's, looks very sleek, definitely worth the money, and it fits nicely not too big not too little just perfect. Looks way better than my Armani watch.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Chronograph doesn't work!! 2x!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these whatches and the chronograph functions didn't work on either one!! The watch looks nice and maybe you don't need those functions but I expect them to work.
customer_reviews.author: JBM

customer_reviews.title: Junk not water proof at all
customer_reviews.text: If no stars were an option thats what this would get. Im on my 3rd invicta watch in 1 year and everyone got water in it just from washing my hands. And during regular everyday activities all 3 watches have come apart where the band and the time piece meet. Never buying a again unless invicta offers a repair or something... Im almost $300 out on this junk
customer_reviews.author: Anthony montoya

customer_reviews.title: Quality watch for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I have owned it for 5 years and I still receive compliments on it. Great quality watch that looks more expensive than it really is. Still accurate and the battery is still going strong after 5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Brian B

customer_reviews.title: Why Invicta watches are my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch when I first started my collection and it is still one of my absolute favorites. No to bulky, not to thin The color still hasn't dulled after I've showered with it, worked with it, swam in it in a lake and left it the sun a couple times. The face of the watch is absolutely gorgeous. It's very durable too, I've dropped it on the ground, smaked thing's, bumped things and done so much that most watches would nick or scratch and it still looks new. Quality watch and made Invicta my favorite watch brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ayrion

customer_reviews.title: Merry Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I really like the watch, it even looks better in person, it is a large watch I think its 45 mm, I have a small wrist and had to remove 4 links, the pins that hold the links are really in there tight so you will need a jeweler or buy a pin remover, I had a pin remover and did it myself, when I bought it I got it for $61 and now I see its up to $81 so I guess I got a bargain,
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: A high end show off!
customer_reviews.text: Loving it, it’s getting attention and it looks more expensive than it is! It’s got some weight to it. The silverish toned dial gives it just enough contrast to easily read the time against the gold bezel and band. I tried to take the pic in good lighting to accurately show it off’
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best looking face on any watch I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Best looking face on any watch I have ever seen. Comes very big so you will most likely have to removes some links, but the watch is very sturdy feeling. Haven't worn it yet as I need to get some links removed first, but it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Feels very well made. Im loving the screw down crown & bottoms which prevent me from accidentally pressing them & draining the battery. Has some weight to it, but not very much. Looks are amazing, really pops in the sun light.
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Will order more watches from this seller !
customer_reviews.text: I have to have one or two kinks removed for it it fit. I hoped it would come in my size but that's not a big deal. The watch is perfect. I have had several Michalel Kors and Marc Jacobs stainless steel watches and I just wanted to see if this one would be the same quality at a much cheaper price compared to those. I am extremely impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy
customer_reviews.text: Very Classy watch. In my opinion not for everyday to wear. Looks amazing in every way and I wear it for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan C

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, looks pretty nice on wrist. Watch looks official with authentic looking packaging although boxes seems aged as if they sat for a long time. Came in official looking retail packaging with all warranty and manual information.
customer_reviews.author: Real Honest Reviewers

customer_reviews.title: More than pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous to buy this for my boyfriends birthday but I am so happy with my purchase. It looks like it costs wayyy more than it does. The box it comes in makes a statement too! I would 100% buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rowlands

customer_reviews.title: Fake...fake....fake
customer_reviews.text: Fake watch , I have several authentic invicta watches as well do my husband. This was a birthday gift for him and after inspecting the watch it’s a fake.

customer_reviews.title: Super nice.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a bday gift for my bf. He loves it. It looks definitely like the picture.

customer_reviews.text: It's too big for my wtist but I'll go to the mall and get it fixed. Looks good though. I'll be buying another since this will be my everyday watch too. I will surely complain if the colors fadeso stay tuned.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely met my expectations. I just recieved the watch ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely met my expectations. I just recieved the watch a few days ago and with it came plenty of compliments. Check out the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jerard M.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, durable and keeps it shine.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my husband. He loves his watch and only wears this one on special occasions.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and I approve this review.
customer_reviews.text: Everything with this watch is the best and every where I go people compliment me how nice that watch is. Trust me it's worth the money and I Approve this Review !!️

customer_reviews.title: Item was as described Just too big had to remove a lot of links
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described Just too big had to remove a lot of links

customer_reviews.title: The face of the watch looks like it’s pure solid yellow gold though
customer_reviews.text: It’s really tough to imitate a gold bracelet but they did a decent job. I will probably swap out the gold bracelet for a leather one. The face of the watch looks like it’s pure solid yellow gold though. I went to a jeweler to have both watches that I purchased resized and the jeweler was amazed at the quality of the watches and was completely shocked when I told him how much I paid for them.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch, my first all gold watch and I was not dissapointed in the slightest. I wear it all the time now. If you're unsure about the watch my advice would be to get it, I was unsure of it too even for the first couple times I wore it and now it is the watch I wear most often.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Gimenez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful watch
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my son for Father’s Day. He loved the gold and appearance of the phone. He went on and on as to how beautiful and sophisticated the watch was. Very good choice
customer_reviews.author: Reads a lot CA

customer_reviews.title: Buy for its hansome attractiveness!
customer_reviews.text: It is a handsome men's dress watch that collects many positive comments ! The price is right and I plan on another purchase of a digital watch of the same brand in the near future. Why? I'm one of those people who tends to wear the same watch daily whatever my plans for the day & this one has to much beauty to mess it up with paint scratches etc which come to be distracting and this is a much beautiful time piece to allow it s appearance to be demeaned in that manner!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Adams

customer_reviews.title: JBW Saxon watch
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful watch! I bought this as a birthday present for my husband and he was speechless when he saw them for the first time. 130 diamonds and 18k gold. Recommend to buy!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful. It's a well made watch and has good weight to it. I bought it for my husband for fathers day and it will be his second Invicta that he owns. I love Invictas they are beautiful watches and the quality speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jannette Jurado

customer_reviews.title: Practical for an active Lady
customer_reviews.text: My fiancee purchased this watch for me after looking at gold tone watches for over 4 months. While this is not your typical girl gold watch with a lot of bling and/or feminine, I wanted something that i did not have to worry about getting wet or going swimming. This dive watch is perfect. The finish is beautiful. It is large but for an average size woman it looks modern. So i got beauty and functionality in this watch. For the prize, cant beat the value.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha M. Sears

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Bought it for my boyfriend 5 years ago and it still looks great! Great price.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this watch. Definitely worth it.

customer_reviews.text: Great watch, great price. This is a heavy duty watch, which looks amazing. Finely crafted, well-packaged for gift. My son loves it.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch ! Feels like good quality and looks like it too very well worth the money!

Many compliments and people estimate its worth to be $800+ looking at it in person. I love the waterproof feature that way I wont worry when washing my hands or getting near bodies of water.

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch as a gift for my husband and he absolutely loves it! It looks great, too!

customer_reviews.title: Way to long a of a band
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful watch but the band is huge. It would take a giant to wear this. I need to have at least 3 inches removed from it. I have never seen a watch that has a band this large.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M McCarter

customer_reviews.title: Then I realized there was a clear plastic cover over the watch face to protect it and when I removed it everything was fine. It
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was going to return the watch because it was hard to read the dials. Then I realized there was a clear plastic cover over the watch face to protect it and when I removed it everything was fine. It is not as heavy or as bulky as some and fits my wrist well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: To adjust time you need to unscrew dial not pull
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful! Incredible details! Good weight to it. Nice size face. And looks amazing on my wrist!

customer_reviews.title: Best buy in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This watch gives me confidence and motivation whenever I put it on. It looks expensive, and the quality is unmatched for the price. I have received many compliments.

customer_reviews.title: This is not waterProof at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch in one year before.... I only watch in a small pool and suddenly this watch stop!!!... NEVER WORKS AGAIN.

customer_reviews.title: Million doller watch
customer_reviews.text: Baby I look like a million dollers make way for my "50k" watch cant stop looking at it at times just looks amazing

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and very durable for small cost
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, there was very slight tarnish on 1 or 2 links when I received it but only noticeable when looking very close. Instructions are a bit hard to follow when trying to set the time, but I figured it out.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriends birthday and he loves it! The quality is superior and it looks really stylish on us wrist. It's honestly one of his favorite watches.

customer_reviews.text: Fanstastuc Watch ! Love it ! It looks great and is better than I expected just like the reviews say !

customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch for the price. Limited depth range but overall I am satisfied with the purchase.

customer_reviews.text: Im trying to return it for exchange but the item i picked read to much and i cant go back?

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a masterpiece
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch but it seems the face will wear off very soon. It's very affordable and it looks like a 5000$ watch. Am having it here in Ghana west Africa and all my friends love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo Nyarko Mensah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is watch is worth every penny it cost if not more! My first time purchasing was in December for my bestfriend's birthday and he loved it. In fact the watch is so beautiful that it made my boyfriend jealous. So I couldn't help but purchase the watch a second time (even though the price had risen) for my boyfriend because it was just too nice to get him any other kind. It makes for the perfect gift to a fellow. I would recommend this purchase to anyone! Also shipping was fast so that's nice as well! :)
customer_reviews.author: Adreamia w.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect look from church to picnic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son. He loved it. His style is very casual but this watch is elegant without being too flashy.

customer_reviews.title: changes color
customer_reviews.text: this watch changed color within three months and start giving the wrong time...am sooooo damn upset right now as it was a wedding gift for my husband...i should get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: hyacinth thomas

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: A truly beautiful watch. Remarkable craftsmanship and it keeps perfect time. Even the box the watch is housed in shows pride in detail. I will definitely buy Invicta watches again!

customer_reviews.title: Nice and expensive looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my son on his 24th birthday. He really likes it. Nice and expensive looking.

customer_reviews.title: great

customer_reviews.text: I actually love this watch I have worn it a couple of times since I have got it I got it for a great deal compared to other places

customer_reviews.title: One of the best watches I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch. Everybody likes it. It is very elegant and it is really good quality. I have bought 4 of these watches to give to family members.

customer_reviews.text: Got tons of compliments for this piece. Its heavy with excellent quality.

customer_reviews.title: gold coming off
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for my Grandson for Christmas this last year. so only after 41/2 months the gold is coming off!! Very disappointed, because he LOVES the watch otherwise!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful! My husband received it as one of his Father's Day gifts.

customer_reviews.title: Watch Broke
customer_reviews.text: The watch was beautiful, and felt great, nice and solid. Unfortunately my watch broke less than a week after getting it. One side of the bamd that connects to the face fell off. Maybe i just got a bad watch, but just beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jon-Pierre Miles

customer_reviews.title: Know what you're getting for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to read the description. I didn't as a result I may have missed the part that says the chronography dials are for decoration.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this watch!! Get tons of compliments!! No fade in the watch or any problems with it!! Never taken it in the water, but it does say you can take it in water! Overall 10/10 not a single complaint!! Note to anyone reading this, might have to take a couple of links outa the watch to get a proper fit!

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch facing is entirely too small to be a man watch

customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch at an excellent price. Face is just the right size. Gets compliments everywhere. Looks and feels expensive. Can’t go wrong.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift cor someone and the person just loves this watch.

customer_reviews.text: Best looking of the 4 models I bought. Lots of dials and functions, but if your training is as an engineer, or if you really need to know the speed of that carp up ahead, go for it.

customer_reviews.title: So fancy!! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks awesome in person. It's a nice yellow gold color (the pictures make it appear lighter than it actually is), is a perfect size (not too big but not small at all) and looks so fancy. I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend and he gets so many compliments on it every time he wears it. I'm so happy with this purchase that I want to buy one for my dad and my brother. Great value!

customer_reviews.text: This watch is truly beautiful. I thought it was going to have a more white in color face but it's actually a golden color which is even better than I expected it to be . You will not be disappointed with this watch. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STEAL!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous watch that looks way more expensive than its MSRP. A great gift or buy for a young man.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer!

customer_reviews.title: A very nice watch was received
customer_reviews.text: A very nice watch was received, however it does not match the photo on the site. The face of the watch received was also gold plated like the watch's bracelet. The photo of the watch in the site appears white/silver faced. 4* for watch received and returned.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: Great Pro Diver by Invicta
customer_reviews.text: The is a great watch, the pictures does it no justice. It has great weight and I didn't expect that, it shines and will get you plenty of looks. Lots of detail, very well made. Honestly the price should be higher, thank you Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso W.

product_meta.title: Invicta Men's 1774 Pro-Diver Collection 18k Gold Ion-Plated Stainless Steel Watch
product_meta.description:
With a bold design, this Invicta chronograph has a poised and calm ambience that’s sure to have you looking twice.








Plunge into any horizon using the steadfast guidance of the Invicta Pro Diver. Stylishly classic, internal workings are forged with variations of either Swiss chronograph or 21-jewel automatic movements and willingly navigate in depths up to 300 meters. Built with confident prowess, the fortitude with which these timepieces function makes the Pro Diver the quintessential in performance.







Summary of Features

• Movement: Professional Japanese quartz 
• Case and dial: ø 44 mm 
• 18k gold ion-plated stainless steel unidirectional bezel 
• Brushed and polished 18k gold ion-plated stainless steel case and bracelet 
• Flame-fusion crystal 
• Champagne dial with gold tone hands and hour markers 
• Band width of 22 mm 
• Fold-over clasp with safety 
• Chronograph functions with 60 second, 60 minute and 1/10th of a second subdials 
• Water Resistant: 200 meters

Diagrams of Features







Color Variants




With its most inspired creations yet, Invicta demonstrates its technical and design prowess, offering timepieces of style for extreme value. "We have long held firm to the belief that supremely crafted timepieces can be offered for extremely modest sums. It is the founding principle of our flagship and the radical notion that still drives us today. By being true to our convictions, we will continue to turn the balance of power, and deliver true Swiss luxury to anyone who desires it. Let all those who possess our timepieces and pass through our doors witness the quality, value and care in every piece we create, and the spirit of never-ending possibilities in everything we do." 

 These are the words that greet visitors and motivate team members inside the Invicta Watch Group's new worldwide headquarters. Emblazoned in stainless steel, it has been the Invicta message since Day One. 

 With each new timepiece, the company sends up a flare for those looking to be defined not by how much they spend, but how wisely they spend. With its strong collections, the gutsy Swiss brand is guaranteed to keep attracting followers. 

 The art of the craft. Inside an Invicta Workshop
It takes years of training and a great deal of pride to achieve glorious Swiss timepieces by hand. But it takes guts and the courage of your convictions to make those timepieces affordable for everyone who appreciates them. 

 At our Swiss workshops, we mix time-honored traditions with a little bit of horse sense every single day to produce the greatest values in the watch-making world.

Amazin Customer5.0 out of 5 stars A big, bold attention-getter! Great watch!Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2018Verified Purchase The watch looks really good in the pictures. In the flesh, even BETTER. I just got the watch 2 days ago and the compliments haven't stopped. Everyone thinks this watch is worth WAY more than I paid for it. <$90 shipped! It's heavy and a nice size for a man. I have an almost 8" wrist, had to remove 2 links to get a perfect fit. Buy that little tool for adjusting watchbands, you can get one for less than $5 shipped and it will save you a headache and scratches on the watch. Very cool to see the stopwatch work and then click the reset button so the hands go back to 12:00. Honestly, I was wary of buying an Invicta watch. YouTube videos talking smack. After buying this one, I'm definitely going to look for something similar in silver for variety. The only thing that is slightly irksome is that you have to unscrew the heads to activate the buttons. That's to be expected with a watch that is water resistant. Since I don't plan on doing any diving, I think the next one I buy will not be one that requires unscrewing of the crowns, just for ease of use. Not that I think I'll be using that stopwatch that much anyway, but if I do, it will be easier. Buy this watch with total confidence!Read more 28 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Amazon Customer5.0 out of 5 stars I really love this watchReviewed in the United States on December 3, 2015Verified Purchase I really love this watch. it's shiny and durable. I have huge wrists and this is a men's watch but it's perfect for me. Invicta makes the best watches ever.Read more 55 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Patricio Esposito1.0 out of 5 stars Unfortunately the clock brings the bottom button out of its ...Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2017Verified Purchase Unfortunately the clock brings the bottom button out of its position. It came sealed, I guess manufacturing failure. Unfortunately I live outside of the USA and the return cost is too high to request reimbursement.Read more 14 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Amazon Customer5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for moneyReviewed in the United States on December 5, 2015Verified Purchase Nice watch, although I wasn't a fan of the gold band so I swapped in a leather nato strap, which was done using a watch tool and took maybe 2 minutes. I have 8 inch wrists, and when it was delivered was way to big to fit me even, so you will have to remove some links to make it fit if you don't swap out the strap.Read more 71 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Allekkah3.0 out of 5 stars UPDATED - Band is Complete Garbage, but the Watch Itself is GoodReviewed in the United States on July 23, 2019Verified Purchase UPDATE - 26 July 2019 - Wow. The band is so loose and wonky now that it came undone by itself while I was just wearing it normally. I can't believe Invicta is trying to pass this crap off as a "luxury brand". The watch itself is still passable though. Just can't wait for my replacement leather one. I'm taking my review down to 3 stars.

UPDATE - 25 July 2019 - This watch is starting to show wear on the banding after just TWO DAYS of normal use. I work a normal desk job and this band is already starting to show signs of wear where my wrist rests on my desk. The clasp is also MUCH looser and easier to disengage than it was out of the box 3 days ago, which is concerning. I can only imagine how quickly this thing is going to deteriorate in a month's time. I've ordered a nice leather band for it as a replacement. Not a huge deal considering it is a cheap watch, but I wasn't expecting it to be SO BAD. The watch itself is still fine and worth wearing though. I'm knocking a star off for the poor band though.

This review is more just first impressions than a long-time run review. I got this watch because I wanted something a little more dressy to wear to work/when I go out. The watch is presented well in a nice box so it would make an excellent gift.

Pros:

- The first thing you notice about this watch is that it is nice and heavy. The metal is solid and shiny. It doesn't have that cheapy light feel that a lot of bargain bin watches have. I showed my parents and they thought it looked like a $1000+ watch.
- The price. You really can't ask for something much better that looks like this at $70. No, its no SEIKO or Orient, but it doesn't have to be. Some people aren't enthusiasts and just want something that looks cool and doesn't break the bank.
- It was easy to de-link and resize myself with a basic watch repair kit.
- The chronograph function is very cool to look at/use. Very smooth.

Cons:

- The second hand is NOT exactly centered on the minute marks. It wiggles between them depending on how gravity is angled on it. My guess is that the nut/whatever that holds it on center is loose. I'm not sure if I just got a defective one or if all of them are like this.
- Kinda hard to read sometimes, but that's inherent to the design of an all gold watch
- The "warranty" is AWFUl. It's more just like a repair service. You have to pay Invicta $28 if you want them to fix your busted watch I guess. In my opinion, you'd be better off just pitching it in the trash and saving that money for a nicer and more expensive brand lol
- 26 July 2019 UPDATE - The band is essentially unusable after a few days. You HAVE to buy a replacement with this watch.

Overall, I think this watch is a solid choice for the price point. I will probably update some point in the future with how it has held up to daily use.Read more 2 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse DOMINIC G.5.0 out of 5 stars Always with Invicta Watch. itReviewed in the United States on November 5, 2015Verified Purchase A masterpiece watch.I love everything about the watch. I will recommend it to all my friends.Thanks!!!!!.It's a FIVE Star Watch.Read more 41 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Amazon Customer5.0 out of 5 stars Truly awesome 5⭐️Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2016Verified Purchase If you want to look like a baller this watch is for you. It shines and hasn't scratches or faded one bit since I got it a couple months ago and if hit it plenty of times on hard surfaces. I can tell the quality will last. This watch looks even better on your wrist than the picture makes it seem it doesn't do it justice. Keeps time perfect and the clasp is strong. Amazing quality and you can't beat the price, I feel like I'm wearing a watch that costs many times more than I paid and I couldn't be happier, my expectations were high after reading the reviews and it still exceeded them. Buy this watch and don't even think twice!!! A must have for any watch enthusiast or anyone looking to upgrade their look :)Read more 31 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse See all reviews from the United States TOP INTERNATIONAL REVIEWS 
AiM5.0 out of 5 stars Looks like a much more expensive watchReviewed in the United Kingdom on April 13, 2020Verified Purchase This is the second Invictus watch I have bought, in truth I have more watches than I need already but I didn't have a nice yellow gold watch. When this came up on a lightning deal I couldn't resist the bargain that this represented.
It came in a lovely presentation box with warranty and papers just the same as a watch costing 30 times the price.
I have worn it about a dozen times in the last year and it always looks good, the battery is still going strong (almost all my other watches are automatic) and it has kept excellent time. I have had some positive comments when wearing it and everyone that has seen it has assumed it cost many times what I paid for it. The colour is still great and I will continue to wear it whenever it goes with the occasion warrants it. I would happily buy another Invictus watch if one comes up in a colour I don't already have in my collection.
As always with amazon it was well packed and swiftly sent.Read more Helpful Sending feedback...Thank you for your feedback.Sorry, we failed to record your vote. feature_bullets: Gold ion-plated dive watch featuring unidirectional bezel and champagne-tone dial with logo and 60-second, 60-minute, and 1/10-second subdials
43.5 mm 18k gold ion-plated stainless steel case with flame fusion dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Three-link stainless steel bracelet featuring fold-over clasp with safety closure
Water resistant to 200 m (660 ft): In general, suitable for professional marine activity and serious surface water sports, but not scuba diving.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
